channel.title: Jnewbykbc
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1097.photobucket.com/albums/g341/get_wasted/grief2.png[/img]
[u][b]Blunt and to the point:[/b][/u] This kid comes into our village steals my bed. refuses to admit he stole it, moved into somebodies house without permission, broke the guest house and pretty much every door in the village, and griefed the shit out of us in general. BAN.
Thanks, Instinctz101

item.title: Jnewbykbc

item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Banned for a week. Fourth report against him aswell as me finding multiple things around the map he has stolen and destroyed. I also warned him previously but he decided not to listen obviously.
